text_block_list.text: —This is Tracen Academy.
Many promising Uma Musume gather here, running for the "Twinkle Series", the glorious stage they all long for…
They spend their days in friendly competition, learning with friends, training body and mind…
… However—

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Crisis ！！！！！

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: It caaan't go on like this… ！！！！

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: What's going on, chairwoman?

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Tazuna! As chairwoman of Tracen Academy, loving Uma Musume with all my heart…

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Concern! I'm very concerned about the current situation, where they can't fully display their shining individuality!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: That! Is! Why!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Proposal! I'm planning to organize a new race!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: What? A- A new race …!?

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Affirmation! Beyond the Twinkle Series they all aspire to!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: I'm creating a new big race, with all distances and all courses!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: It's called—

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: URA Finals!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: URA… Finals…!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Come on, Tazuna, let's get busy!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Without delay! Get ready for the press conference to share this great news!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Chairwoman …!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: —Yes, ma'am. I'll make the arrangements!
… This is how the new race — URA Finals — was conceived.
This race was set up as a stage for all kinds of horse girls to shine.
The story of you and your horse girl begins now!
The story of you and your horse girl begins now!
